sentences.en: "Third World" is an abstraction, a form of shorthand.
sentences.cn: “第三世界”是个抽象概念，是一种简称。

sentences.en: a secretary who takes shorthand (= writes in shorthand )
All the students took down the speech in shorthand.
sentences.cn: 学生们把那篇讲话都速记了下来.

sentences.en: He took down the minutes in shorthand.
sentences.cn: 他将会议记录速记下来。

sentences.en: He took the notes in shorthand.
His farewell speech was transcribed from shorthand notes.
sentences.cn: 他的告别演说是由速记转译而成的.

sentences.en: I can't read your shorthand notes.
sentences.cn: 我看不懂你的速记符号.

sentences.en: I have to translate these shorthand notes into longhand.
sentences.cn: 我得将这些速记的笔记译成普通文字.

sentences.en: I took down his comments in shorthand.
sentences.cn: 我用速记法把他的评论记录了下来。

sentences.en: She is learning to write shorthand.
Shorthand and typewriting have been described as the twin arts.
sentences.cn: 速记和打字被说成是一对孪生技巧.

sentences.en: The fiction that "he" is a neutral shorthand for "he or she" is no longer acceptable to many.
sentences.cn: 认为“他”是“他或她”的中性简称的这种说法，很多人已不再接受。

sentences.en: The reporters took down the speech in shorthand.
sentences.cn: 记者们迅速记下讲话的内容.

sentences.en: The reporters took his speech down in shorthand.
sentences.cn: 记者用速记记下了他的讲演.

sentences.en: to take sth down in shorthand

trans.tran_cn: 速记，速记法，简略的表达方式
trans.tran_en: a fast method of writing using special signs or shorter forms to represent letters, words, and phrases
